src_original: acintyādvayaniṣkalpaśuddhivyaktivipakṣataḥ /  yo yena ca virāgo 'sau dharmaḥ satyadvilakṣaṇaḥ // 10 //
tgt_original: 八法者，一不可思量、二無二、三無分別、四清淨、五照了因、六對治、七離欲、八離欲因。

src_original: anena samāsato 'ṣṭābhirguṇaiḥ saṃgṛhītaṃ dharmaratnamudbhāvitam /  aṣṭau guṇāḥ katame /  acintyatvamadvayatā nirvikalpatā śuddhirabhivyaktikaraṇaṃ pratiparkṣatā virāgo virāgaheturiti /
tgt_original: 此八合有二意：

src_original: nirodhamārgasatyābhyāṃ saṃgṛhītā virāgitā /
tgt_original: 一離欲，是滅諦；

src_original: guṇaistribhistribhiścaite veditavye yathākramam // 11 //  eṣāmeva yathākramaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ guṇānāṃ tribhirādyairacintyādvayanirvikalpatāguṇairnirodhasatyaparidīpanādvirāgasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /  tribhiravaśiṣṭaiḥ śuddhyabhivyaktipratipakṣatāguṇairmārgasatyaparidīpanādvirāgahetusaṃgraha iti /  yaśca virāgo nirodhasatyaṃ yena ca virāgo mārgasatyena tadubhayamabhisamasya vyavadānasatya dvayalakṣaṇo virāgadharma iti paridīpitam /  atarkyatvādalāpyatvādāryajñānādacinyatā /
tgt_original: 二離欲因，即是道諦。

src_original: śivatvādadvayākalpau śuddhyādi trayanarkavat // 12 //  samāsato nirodhasatyasya tribhiḥ kāraṇairacintyatvaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 前不可思量等三句屬滅諦攝，次清淨等三句屬道諦攝。

src_original: katamaistribhiḥ /
tgt_original: 初離欲有三句：

src_original: asatsatsadasannobhayaprakāraiścaturbhirapi tarkāgocaratvāt /  sarvarutaravitaghoṣavākpathaniruktisaṃketavyavahārābhilāpairanabhilāpyatvāt /  āryāṇāṃ ca pratyātmavedanīyatvāt /
tgt_original: 一者云何不可思量於有無等四句，覺觀思量不能通達故、一切眾生言語名句味等不能詮辯故、唯聖人無分別智所證知故，故名不可思量。

src_original: (Rgv 12) tatra nirodhasatyasya kathamadvayatā nirvikalpatā ca veditavyā /  yathoktaṃ bhagavatā /
tgt_original: 二無二者，如經中說：

src_original: śivo 'yaṃ śāriputra dharmakāyo 'dvayadharmāvikalpadharmā /
tgt_original: 舍利弗！ 諸佛法身無二法、無分別法。

src_original: tatra dvayamucyate karma kleśāṃśca /
tgt_original: 所言二者，煩惱及業是名為二。

src_original: vikalpa ucyate karmakleśasamudayaheturayoniśomanasikāraḥ /
tgt_original: 如來法身無此二法，故名無二。 三無分別，分別者，煩惱業家習不正思惟，由不正思惟故起二。 由通達自性故滅二，是二及分別不應不行。 不應者，上心煩惱不相應共行； 不行者，隨眠煩惱不共隨行。

src_original: tatprakṛtinirodhaprativedhād dvayavikalpāsamudācārayogena yo duḥkhasyātyantamanutpāda idamucyate duḥkhanirodhasatyam /
tgt_original: 即不應不行此二處故，故說如來法身苦滅究竟永無生起。 云何如此？ 非為除滅一法故名為滅，以本來不生故名為滅。 如《無上依經》中說：

src_original: yatra cittamanovijñānāni na pravartante tatra na kaścitparikalpo yena parikalpenāyoniśomanasikuryāt /
tgt_original: 於無生無滅法中，心意及識決定不生故。

src_original: sa yoniśomanasikārapra yukto 'vidyāṃ na samutvāpayati /
tgt_original: 心者即六識心，意者阿陀那識，識者阿梨耶識，於此三中不得生故。 此中若無三識則無分別，分別既無亦無不正思惟等。 既無三識則不得起無明，是以如來法身離不正思惟故則不起無明。

src_original: yaccāvidyāsamutthānaṃ tad dvādaśānāṃ bhavāṅgānāmasamutthānam /  sājātiriti vistaraḥ /
tgt_original: 若不起無明，十二有分不為生緣，故名不生。

src_original: na khalu bhagavan dharmavināśo duḥkhanirodhaḥ /
tgt_original: 是苦滅者，非滅壞法名為苦滅。

src_original: nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ śāśvataḥ prakṛtipariśuddhaḥ sarvakleśakośavinirmukto gaṅgāvālikāvyativṛttairavinirbhāgairacintyairbuddhadharmaiḥ
tgt_original: 由苦滅名無始時節非作非生、無滅離盡、常住恒寂、湛然自性清淨、解脫一切煩惱㲉、功德過恒沙數，相攝非相離，不捨離智、不可思惟，與如來法相應。

src_original: samanvāgatastathāgatadharmakāyo deśitaḥ /  ayameva ca bhagavaṃstathāgatadharmakāyo 'vinirmuktakleśakośastathāgatagarbhaḥ sūcyate /
tgt_original: 如來法身諸佛所說，是如來法身，說名離欲。

src_original: iti sarvavistareṇa yathāsūtrameva duḥkhanirodhasatyavyavasthānamanugantavyam /  asya khalu duḥkhanirodhasaṃjñitasya tathāgatadharmakāyasya prāptiheturavikalpajñānadarśanabhāvanāmārgastrividhena sādharmyeṇa dinakarasadṛśaḥ veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 二離欲因者，為得此法身，見諦道、修道所攝。 由境界故，說無分別智有三義與日相似：

src_original: rūpābhidhyaktikaraṇasādharmyeṇa sarvākārajñeyāvabhāsakatvāt /  tamaḥpratipakṣasādharmyeṇa ca sarvākārasatyadarśanavibandhapratipakṣabhūtatvāt /
tgt_original: 能照了一切境界故，與日明相似； 能對治一切真見暗障故，與日光相似。

src_original: sa ca tathā draṣṭavyo yathā parigaveṣayanna tasya kiṃcinnimittamārambaṇaṃ vā paśyati /  sa yadā na nimittaṃ nārambaṇaṃ vā paśyati tadā bhūtaṃ paśyati /
tgt_original: 云何見知？ 謂如實思量不見想及不見境。 境者名分別性、想名依他，不見分別、依他二性故，名為真實見知一界。 又想者人，境者法，不見此人法想境，故名二空。

src_original: evamete dharmāstathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ samatayā samā iti /
tgt_original: 如是一切諸法，如來悉見悉知，由平等平等已通達如真實故。

src_original: tatra pūrveṇa ślokārthena ki darśitam /  dharmakāyajinajñānakaruṇādhātusaṃgrahāt /  pātraratnāmbubhiḥ sāmyamudherasya darśitam // 43 //  trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ yathāsaṃkhyameva trividhena mahāsamudrasādharmyeṇa tathāgatadhātorhetusamanvāgamamadhikṛtya yogārtho veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 由因攝者，是如來性清淨。 有四種因、三種法與三譬相似，故取海為喻。

src_original: katamāni trīṇi sthānāni /  tadyathā dharmakāyaviśuddhihetuḥ /  buddhajñānasamudāgamahetuḥ /
tgt_original: 三法者，一法身清淨因、二佛智德生因、三佛恩德因。

src_original: tathāgatamahākaruṇāvṛttiheturiti /  (Rgv 38) tatra dharmakāyaviśuddhiheturmahāyānādhimuktibhāvanā draṣṭavyā /
tgt_original: 法身清淨因者，修習信樂大乘應知。 佛智德生因者，修習般若及禪定應知。 恩德因者，修習菩薩大悲應知。

src_original: tatra mahāyānādhimuktibhāvanāyā bhājanasādharmyaṃ tasyāmaparimeyākṣayaprajñāsamādhiratnakaruṇāvārisamavasaraṇāt /
tgt_original: 修習信樂大乘者，與器相似，此中有無量定慧大寶所遍滿故，故說與器相似。

src_original: prajñāsamādhimukhabhāvanāyā ratnāsādharmyaṃ tasya nirvikalpatvādacintyaprabhāvaguṇayogācca /
tgt_original: 修習般若禪定與寶相似者，般若無分別故； 禪定不可思惟，功德所依止故。 般若如淨寶，禪定如如意寶。

src_original: bodhisattvakaruṇābhāvanāyā vārisādharmyaṃ tasyāḥ sarvajagati paramasnigdhabhāvaikarasalakṣaṇaprayogāditi /
tgt_original: 修習菩薩大悲如清淨水，於一切世間眾生潤滑一味故，譬如大海唯一醎味。

src_original: abhijñājñānavaimalyatathatāvyatirekataḥ /  dīpālokoṣṇavarṇasya sādharmyaṃ vimalāśraye // 44 //  trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ yathāsaṃkhyameva trividhena dīpasādharmyeṇa tathāgatadhātoḥ phalasamanvāgamamadhikṛtya yogārtho veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 次由果攝者，明如來法身有三種法，與三譬相似故，能總攝三譬。 相似者，如日有三： 一體、二光、三明。 此與三身相似故。

src_original: katamani trīṇi sthānāni /
tgt_original: 三法者：

src_original: abhijñā āsravakṣayajñānamāsravakṣayaśceti /
tgt_original: 一神通、二流滅、三顯淨。

src_original: tatra pañcānāmabhijñānāṃ jvālāsādharmyaṃ tāsāmarthānubhavajñānavipakṣāndhakāravidhamanapratyupasthānalakṣaṇatvāt /
tgt_original: 一神通者，譬日有明，能除障自境界無明之暗，以為事用故，與日明相似。

src_original: āsravakṣayajñānasyoṣṇasādharmya tasya niravaśeṣakarmakleśendhanadahanapratyupasthānalakṣaṇatvāt /
tgt_original: 二流滅者，謂盡、無生智能燒除業煩惱令無餘，以為事用故，與日光相似。

src_original: tatraiṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ pudgalānāmavasthāprabhedārthamārabhya ślokaḥ /  aśuddho 'śuddhaśuddho 'tha suviśuddho yathākramam /  sattvadhāturiti prokto bodhisattvastathāgataḥ // 47 //  anena kiṃ darśitam /  svabhāvādibhirityebhiḥ ṣaḍbhirartheḥ samāsataḥ /  dhātustisṛṣvavasthāsu vidito nāmabhistribhiḥ // 48 //  iti ye kecidanāsravadhātunirdeśā nānādharmaparyāyamukheṣu bhagavatā vistareṇa nirdiṣṭāḥ
tgt_original: 如來所說八萬四千法門，為六種所攝，次第在三位中。

src_original: sarveta ebhireva samāsataḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ svabhāvahetuphalakarmayogavṛttyarthaḥ saṃgṛhītāstisṛṣvavasthāsu  yathākramaṃ trināmanirdeśato nirdiṣṭā veditavyāḥ /  yadutāśuddhāvasthāyāṃ sattvadhāturiti /
tgt_original: 三位者，一不淨位，謂眾生界。

src_original: aśuddhaśuddhāvasthāyāṃ bodhisattva iti /
tgt_original: 二者淨位，謂菩薩地。

src_original: suviśuddhāvasthāyāṃ tathāgata iti /
tgt_original: 三者最清淨位，即是佛地。

src_original: ayameva śāriputra dharmakāyo 'paryantakleśakośakoṭigūḍhaḥ /  saṃsārastrotasā uhmamāno 'navarāgrasaṃsāragaticyutyupapattiṣu saṃcaran sattvadhāturityucyate /
tgt_original: 是如來法界，無量無邊諸煩惱㲉之所隱蔽，隨生死流漂沒六道無始輪轉，我說名眾生界。

src_original: sa eva śāriputra dharmakāyaḥ saṃsārastrotoduḥkhanirviṣṇo viraktaḥ sarvakāmaviṣayebhyo daśapāramitāntargataiścaturaśītyā (Rgv 41)  dharmaskandhasahasrairbodhāya caryā caran bodhisattva ityucyate /
tgt_original: 阿難！ 是眾生界，於生死苦而起厭離、除六塵欲，依八萬四千法門諸波羅蜜所攝修菩提道，我說名菩薩。 阿難！

src_original: sa eva punaḥ śāriputra dharmakāyaḥ sarvakleśakośaparimuktaḥ sarvaduḥkhatikrāntaḥ
tgt_original: 是眾生界，已得出離諸煩惱㲉、過一切苦，洗除垢穢究竟，法然清淨澄潔，為諸眾生之所願見，微妙上地、一切智地，一切無礙，入此中住，至無比能，已得法王大自在力，我說名如來。
